description: According to a survey conducted from April to August 2022, approximately 25 percent of adults in Canada who reported longer-term COVID-19 symptoms after being infected were unvaccinated.
cleaned_text: Long COVID symptoms among adults in Canada 2022, by vaccination status [According to a survey conducted from April to August 2022, approximately 25 percent of adults in Canada who reported longer-term COVID-19 symptoms after being infected were unvaccinated. In comparison, only 12.2 percent of respondents that received three vaccine doses against COVID-19 had reported longer-term symptoms. This statistic shows the percentage of adults reporting longer-term COVID-19 symptoms in Canada as of August
